  * "The Godfather" (1972) - This classic mafia movie follows the Corleone family over several generations.
  * "The Godfather Part II" (1974) - This epic follow-up to "The Godfather" continues the story of the Corleone family in post-Vietnam America.

  * "Goodfellas" (1990) - This darkly humorous movie directed by Martin Scorsese follows the rise and fall of mobster Frank Costello.
  * "The Irishman" (2019) - This epic follow-up to "Goodfellas" continues the story of the Corleone family in post-Vietnam America.

  * "Casino" (1995) - This epic gangster movie directed by Martin Scorsese tells the story of the real-life gangster Sam LaMotta.
  * "The Departed" (2006) - This epic gangster movie directed by Martin Scorsese tells the story of the rise and fall of a New York City police detective.
  * "Scarface" (1983) - This classic gangster movie directed by Stephen Seagal tells the story of Antonio Rodriguez, also known as Scarface.
